metadata.Name: TUNIZI
metadata.Description: TUNIZI is a Tunisian Arabizi sentiment analysis dataset collected from Twitter. It contains 10k tweets labeled with sentiment polarity (positive, negative, neutral).
metadata.Paper Title: TUNIZI: A Tunisian Arabizi Sentiment Analysis Dataset
metadata.Abstract: Arabizi is a way of writing Arabic using Latin characters. It is widely used in social media and online communication by Arabic speakers. Sentiment analysis of Arabizi is a challenging task due to the lack of standardized spelling and grammar. In this paper, we present TUNIZI, a Tunisian Arabizi sentiment analysis dataset collected from Twitter. The dataset contains 10k tweets labeled with sentiment polarity (positive, negative, neutral). We evaluate the performance of several state-of-the-art sentiment analysis models on the dataset. The results show that the models achieve reasonable performance, but there is still room for improvement. We also analyze the characteristics of the dataset and identify some challenges for Arabizi sentiment analysis.
